Package shaharas

Class Expression

java.lang.Object
shaharas.Expression
public class Expression extends Object
This class represents an expression and its evaluation. It allows for parsing, calculating, and storing results for mathematical expressions with variables. The expression is parsed and evaluated based on operators and variables provided via the OperatorsFactory and VariableEXP classes.

    • Expression

      public Expression(String expression)
      Constructs an Expression object with the given expression string.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • calculate

      public VariableEXP calculate(OperatorsFactory operatorsFactory, HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables)
      Calculates the value of the expression based on provided operators and variable values.
      Parameters:
      operatorsFactory - A factory that provides operator info and creator methods.
      variables - A map of variable names to their corresponding VariableEXP objects.
      Returns:
      The calculated VariableEXP object containing the result.

    • calculateLoop

      private int calculateLoop(AtomicInteger expressionIndex, StringBuilder currentSTR, HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables, OperatorsFactory operatorsFactory, Stack<Operators> CalculationStack)
      Performs the main calculation loop, handling nested expressions and operator precedence.
      Parameters:
      expressionIndex - A reference to the current index in the expression.
      currentSTR - The current string being parsed.
      variables - A map of variable names to their corresponding VariableEXP objects.
      operatorsFactory - A factory that provides operator info and creator methods.
      CalculationStack - The stack that holds operators during evaluation.
      Returns:
      The calculated result as an integer.

    • loopToSpaceAndSkipSpace

      private void loopToSpaceAndSkipSpace(StringBuilder currentSTR, AtomicInteger expressionIndex)
      Loops through the expression until a space is encountered and then skips the space.
      Parameters:
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      expressionIndex - The index of the current position in the expression.

    • checkIfNumberOrVariableOrUnary

      private void checkIfNumberOrVariableOrUnary(AtomicInteger number, StringBuilder currentSTR, VariableEXP variable, HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables, AtomicInteger expressionIndex, OperatorInfo info, OperatorsFactory operatorsFactory, List<Integer> values)
      Checks if the current part of the expression is a number, a variable, or a unary operator. If it's a number or variable, it parses the value. If it's a unary operator, it calculates its result.
      Parameters:
      number - The AtomicInteger to store the result.
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      variable - A VariableEXP object that represents a variable.
      variables - A map holding the variables.
      expressionIndex - The index of the current position in the expression.
      info - The OperatorInfo object for the current operator.
      operatorsFactory - The OperatorsFactory used to find operators.
      values - A list of values for unary operator calculations.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the expression is invalid.

    • checkUnary

      private Boolean checkUnary(AtomicInteger expressionIndex, StringBuilder currentSTR, HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables, OperatorsFactory operatorsFactory, List<Integer> values, int... args)
      Checks if the current part of the expression matches a unary operator with the given priorities. If it matches, it calculates the result of the unary operator.
      Parameters:
      expressionIndex - The index of the current position in the expression.
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      variables - A map holding the variables.
      operatorsFactory - The OperatorsFactory used to find operators.
      values - A list of values for unary operator calculations.
      args - The priorities to check for the unary operator.
      Returns:
      true if the unary operator is found and calculated; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the expression is invalid.

    • isDigitCheck

      private boolean isDigitCheck(StringBuilder currentSTR, AtomicInteger number, AtomicBoolean isDigitOrVariable)
      Checks if the current part of the expression is a valid digit.
      Parameters:
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      number - The AtomicInteger to store the result.
      isDigitOrVariable - The flag to indicate if the part is a digit or variable.
      Returns:
      true if it's a digit; false otherwise.

    • isVariableCheck

      private boolean isVariableCheck(StringBuilder currentSTR, HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables, AtomicInteger number, AtomicBoolean isDigitOrVariable)
      Checks if the current part of the expression is a valid variable.
      Parameters:
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      variables - A map holding the variables.
      number - The AtomicInteger to store the result.
      isDigitOrVariable - The flag to indicate if the part is a digit or variable.
      Returns:
      true if it's a variable; false otherwise.

    • isDigitOrVariableCheck

      private boolean isDigitOrVariableCheck(StringBuilder currentSTR, HashMap<String,VariableEXP> variables, AtomicInteger number, AtomicBoolean isDigitOrVariable)
      Checks if the current part of the expression is either a valid digit or a variable.
      Parameters:
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      variables - A map holding the variables.
      number - The AtomicInteger to store the result.
      isDigitOrVariable - The flag to indicate if the part is a digit or variable.
      Returns:
      true if it's a digit or variable; false otherwise.

    • loopExpressionUntilSpace

      private void loopExpressionUntilSpace(StringBuilder currentSTR, AtomicInteger expressionIndex)
      Loops through the expression until a space is encountered and appends the characters to the StringBuilder.
      Parameters:
      currentSTR - The StringBuilder holding the current expression part.
      expressionIndex - The index of the current position in the expression.
